description: This Dart source file defines the OpenAIService class, which provides methods to interact with OpenAI APIs for image-to-text (OCR-like functionality) and image generation. It manages API authorization, handles API calls, and throws errors on failure.

classes.name: OpenAIService
classes.description: A service class for interfacing with OpenAI's API to perform image-to-text and image generation tasks, managing API keys and request logic.

methods.name: imageToText
methods.description: Sends an image URL or base64 string to OpenAI's vision API to extract text content, with optional instructions, max tokens, and temperature. Returns the extracted text.

methods.name: generateImage
methods.description: Creates an image based on a text prompt using OpenAI's image generation API. Returns a URL or base64 data of the generated image.
